title: Day One Of Mario Strikers: Battle League With Team Kinda Funny!
description:
Gather around to watch the most beautiful game with a twist of Mario mayhem and fun with Mario Strikers: Battle League. On day one on the field Mike, Andy, Barrett, and Nick will test their skills and teamwork to go out and dominate the rank leagues!
